title: Yellowstone National Park: Instameets
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Social Media     Instameets                Instameets        Mammoth Hot Springs Instameet, May 20, 2016    Â    Join us as we gather to take photos, make friends, exchange ideas, and share insights into the world's first national park. All ages, levels of experience, and cameras are welcome. Share your photos using #YellowstoneNPS. We look forward to meeting you! April National Park Week Instameet Old Faithful April 23, 2016 at 12 noon Meet at the Old Faithful viewing area May Instameet with National Geographic Photographer Ronan Donovan Sunset at Mammoth Hot Springs May 20, 2016 at 7 pm Meet outside the Albright Visitor Center, then we'll walk up the Old Gardiner Road to the hill above the Mammoth Hot Springs Hotel.  June Instameet with @goyellowstone (Yellowstone Park Foundation) Old Faithful June 17, 2016 at 7 pm Meet at the Haynes Photo Shop (next to the Visitor Education Center) July Instameet with @goyellowstone (Yellowstone Park Foundation) Old Faithful July 15, 2016 at 7 pm Meet at the Haynes Photo Shop (next to the Visitor Education Center) August Centennial Instameet with @yellowstoneya (Yellowstone Association) Lamar Valley August 19, 2016 at 7 pm Meet/park at the Lamar Buffalo Ranch, along the road between Mammoth Hot Springs and the northeast entrance. On park maps, the Buffalo Ranch is marked as "Yellowstone Association Institute."  September Elk Rut Instameet Mammoth Hot Springs September 26, 2016 at 6 pm Meeting on the porch of the Albright Visitor Center
